page_view_item1_description: Discover a unique shopping experience with FruitHUB. Explore our wide collection of premium fresh fruits and get the best deals with top quality.
page_view_item2_description: We bring you the finest hand-picked fruits. Check details, images, and reviews to make sure you choose the perfect fruit.
terms_and_conditions_p1: By creating an account, you agree to

password_must_contain_at_least_one_numbe: Password must contain at least one number
you_should_accept_terms_and_conditions: You should accept terms and conditions
email_sent_to_verify: A verification email has been sent to your inbox. Please check your email and verify your account to continue
